name: Miner Detail
description:
This is a port of an old DOS game I made in 1999. I never added sound so there is currently no sound, but I plan on adding some.

Blow up asteroids to mine the volatile crystals within. Collect them and spend the cash on new weapons and upgrades for your ship.

Controls:

Turn the ship using the mouse, the left and right arro keys or the left controller thumbstick.

Thrust using the right mouse button, up arrow or the B button if your controller is an Xbox style one.

Fire weapons using the left mouse button, left ctrl, or button A.

Hyperspace using the space bar or the X button.

There are issues with various control inputs which I am resolving.
